Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2006 06:53AM Patye wrote: I also start my first chemo next wed (2nd) and I'm scared to death. You all seem so brave this thread is sure to help me. I have some questions. What should i take with me? (book,cd player?) Are you supposed to eat the morning before chemo? Take regular medications? Snack during treatment on ice or crackers or what? Go to the bathroom? help!!!!!!!!!!!
